Prolific, full stack web developer with a passion for metrics and user experience. Proven ability in optimizing web functionality that improve data retrieval and workflow efficiencies. Passionate about building world class web applications. Highly experience in working with multiple web technologies, such as React js, HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Twitter Bootstrap, MySQL, Node js and Express.
